body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
spack install boost @develop
```

The build aborts because the include file `boost/bind.hpp` is not found. The build works fine with the released versions of Boost.

According to the Boost documentation, one needs to run `./b2 headers` after cloning the git repository. I don't see this command run in Boost's `package.py`.
title: Installation issue: boost
